column4: I just installed openjdk-6-jdk but when I do dpkg --get-selections | grep java it doesn't show up in the list..am I doing the search wrong?
where did you get it? software center?
just a tip about java, i would install it from: http://java.com/en/download/linux_manual.jsp?locale=en and just it manually
ok I'll try a few more avenues before I call it quits :)
